mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user_setting (userid, duration, txtColor, shadowColor, bgColor, bgImgUuid, bgImgName) VALUES (#{userId}, #{duration}, #{txtColor}, #{shadowColor}, #{bgColor}, #{bgImgUuid}, #{bgImgName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE duration=#{duration}, txtColor=#{txtColor}, shadowColor=#{shadowColor}, bgColor=#{bgColor}, bgImgUuid=#{bgImgUuid}, bgImgName=#{bgImgName}
